name: Unfall (marshel)
description:
move with a,d or left,right

You have to combine puzzle pieces of the same color. Any time you collect a other colored piece your combo resets. The highest combo are 9 pieces. Higher combos result in higher scores. You also have to avoid the trees.

Leaderboard and submitting scores only work in the Desktop versions.
